thread.section_title: Orchard Street Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Location, location, location
thread.title_full: Location, location, location - Review of Orchard Street Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Ron K
title: Location, location, location
text:
This newer hotel is right in the middle of everything good. Close to trains, bikes, uber, coffee (lots of it) sights, shopping and all of your culinary desires!
Lil Tony's, Katz's deli, ramen (Mr Taka), etc.
The rooms are on the smaller side but they're clean, comfortable and the most consistent air con/heat in any hotel!
There is always a smiling face at the front desk to help with whatever you need (Thanks Kimberly!!!!)
Free coffee and tea in the lobby 24/7
Being my first time there, I'm looking forward to my return.
Enjoy the city!
